name: One Button Computer
description:
Made by HacksawUnit for the Ludum Dare #28 48 hour competition!

One button, one game, and two colors. Your watch stores the high-score.

One Button Computer ranked #14 in the "theme" category out of 2064 entries! Thanks to all who played and rated my game!

Controls:

Use the mouse to move your hand.

Left click the "1" button to interact with the computer.

Left click the speaker (box with a music note) to mute and unmute the game.

Right click and hold to reset your watch. This erases the high-score.
